ValidationRule.description: When Status contains Dismissal then field Reason No Longer Active is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( (TEXT(Case_Role_Status__c)) = "Dismissal - Claimant" || (TEXT(Case_Role_Status__c)) = "Dismissal - Deputy" || (TEXT(Case_Role_Status__c)) = "Dismissal - Ineffective service" || (TEXT(Case_Role_Status__c)) = "No Longer Active On Case" ) && ( ISBLANK(Reason_No_Longer_Active__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Reason No Longer Active is required
